subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: With the United States using a strong second half to beat Cuba, several players, especially Chris Wondolowski, improved their standing in the eyes of Jurgen Klinsmann.
snippet: With the United States using a strong second half to beat Cuba, several players, especially Chris Wondolowski, improved their standing in the eyes of Jurgen Klinsmann.
